sqlMap.select: select * from $DB_NEOS$t_co_group_path where os_type = #osType# and path_seq = #pathSeq#

select `GROUP`, CODE, NAME, USE_YN, ORDER_NUM, NOTE, LINK from cust_sto.t_purchase_code_detail where 1=1
and USE_YN = '$useYn$'
and `group`='$group$'
order by `GROUP`, ORDER_NUM

SELECT seq, manage_no, contract_no, write_comp_seq, write_dept_seq, write_emp_seq, write_dt, noti_type, budget_type, target_type, title, contract_start_dt, contract_end_dt, amt, std_amt, tax_amt, base_law, pay_type_info, work_info, emergency_yn, restrict_sector_yn, compete_type, restrict_sector_info, restrict_area_info, nominee_info, decision_type_info, contract_form1, contract_form2, contract_form3, rebid_yn, eorder_use_yn, created_dt, created_by, modify_dt, modify_by FROM cust_sto.t_purchase_contract;

SELECT a.seq, a.manage_no, a.contract_no, a.write_comp_seq, a.write_dept_seq, dm.dept_name as write_dept_name, a.write_emp_seq, em.emp_name as write_emp_name, a.write_dt, a.noti_type, a.budget_type, a.target_type, a.title, a.contract_start_dt, a.contract_end_dt, FORMAT(a.amt, 0) as amt, FORMAT(a.std_amt, 0) as std_amt, FORMAT(a.tax_amt, 0) as tax_amt, a.base_law, a.pay_type_info, a.work_info, a.emergency_yn, a.restrict_sector_yn, a.compete_type, a.restrict_sector_info, a.restrict_area_info, a.nominee_info, a.decision_type_info, a.contract_form1, a.contract_form2, a.contract_form3, a.rebid_yn, a.eorder_use_yn, a.created_dt, a.created_by, a.modify_dt, a.modify_by,
a.doc_sts, a.approkey_plan, a.approkey_meet, a.approkey_result
FROM cust_sto.t_purchase_contract a left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_dept_multi dm on a.write_dept_seq = dm.dept_seq and dm.lang_code = 'kr' left join $DB_NEOS$t_co_emp_multi em on a.write_emp_seq = em.emp_seq and em.lang_code = 'kr' where seq = $seq$
SELECT seq FROM cust_sto.t_purchase_contract where manage_no = '$manage_no$'
sqlMap.delete: delete from cust_sto.t_purchase_attach_info where seq = '$seq$' and outProcessCode = '$outProcessCode$';
sqlMap.select: select * from cust_sto.t_purchase_attach_info where seq = '$seq$' and outProcessCode = '$outProcessCode$'

select b.LINK, b.CODE, b.NAME, ifnull(c.file_id,'') as file_id, ifnull(c.file_name,'') as file_name, ifnull(c.file_ext,'') as file_ext, 'N' as new_yn from cust_sto.t_purchase_code_group a join cust_sto.t_purchase_code_detail b on a.`group` = b.`group` and a.USE_YN ='Y' and b.USE_YN = 'Y' left join cust_sto.t_purchase_attach_info c on b.`GROUP` = concat('attachForm_', c.outProcessCode) and b.CODE = c.form_code where a.`group` = concat('attachForm_', '$outProcessCode$') and c.seq = '$seq$'
